Trigger.name: hide on death
Trigger.script: send("hide")

regexCodeList.string: ^(A|An) (.*) vanishes in the blink of an eye\!$
^You fail to step into the shadows\.$

Trigger.name: camo on death
Trigger.script: send("camo")

regexCodeList.string: ^You fail to blend in with your surroundings\.$
^(A|An) (.*) vanishes in the blink of an eye\!$

Trigger.name: rescueself
Trigger.script: if string.lower(matches[5]) == string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[5]),1,3) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,3) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[5]),1,4) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,4) then setMyConfiguration("RescueSelfHp", tonumber(matches[6]) , "1") send("gstatus I will rescue tank when I have more than or equal to ("..tostring(tonumber(matches[6]))..")hp.") end

Trigger.name: up
Trigger.script: expandAlias("sta") if hardiness == false then send("cast hardiness") end

Trigger.name: rescueat
Trigger.script: if string.lower(matches[5]) == string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[5]),1,3) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,3) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[5]),1,4) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,4) then setMyConfiguration("RescueTankHp", tonumber(matches[6]) , "1") send("gstatus I will rescue tank when they are equal to or below ("..tostring(tonumber(matches[6]))..")hp.") end

Trigger.name: cure blind
Trigger.script: send("cast cure blind " .. matches[5])

Trigger.name: refill canteens
Trigger.script: if Tank == gmcp.Char.Score.name or matches[2] == Tank then fillstring = "" expandAlias("refillwater") end

Trigger.name: refill canteens say
Trigger.script: fillstring = "" expandAlias("refillwater")

Trigger.name: cure poison
Trigger.script: send("cast cure poison " .. matches[5])

Trigger.name: hiding on off
Trigger.script:
local knownhide = false local knowncamo = false
if string.lower(matches[5]) == string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[5]),1,3) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,3) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[5]),1,4) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,4) then
create_tfe_database() local mydb = db:get_database("skills")
if gmcp.Char.Score.level > 79 then
local results = db:fetch(mydb.abilities, { db:eq(mydb.abilities.ability, "camouflage"), db:eq(mydb.abilities.character, gmcp.Char.Score.name), db:eq(mydb.abilities.account, gmcp.Char.Score.account)})
if next(results) then for _, row in ipairs(results) do if tonumber(row.level) > 0 then knowncamo = true disableTrigger("hide on death") enableTrigger("camo on death") end end else knowncamo = false end end
if gmcp.Char.Score.level > 9 and knowncamo == false then
local results = db:fetch(mydb.abilities, { db:eq(mydb.abilities.ability, "hide"), db:eq(mydb.abilities.character, gmcp.Char.Score.name), db:eq(mydb.abilities.account, gmcp.Char.Score.account)})
if next(results) then for _, row in ipairs(results) do if tonumber(row.level) > 0 then knownhide = true disableTrigger("camo on death") enableTrigger("hide on death") end end else knownhide = false end end
if string.lower(matches[7]) == "on" then send("gstatus " .. gmcp.Char.Score.name .. " has hiding enabled.") enableTrigger("AutoHiding") if knowncamo then send("camo") end if knownhide then send("hide") end elseif string.lower(matches[7]) == "off" then send("gstatus " .. gmcp.Char.Score.name .. " has hiding disabled.") disableTrigger("AutoHiding") if knowncamo then send("uncamo") end if knownhide then send("unhide") end end end

Trigger.name: help
Trigger.script:
if (string.lower(matches[6]) == string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[6]),1,3) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,3) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[6]),1,4) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,4)) and (string.lower(matches[7]) == "help" or string.lower(matches[7]) == "status") then
expandAlias("standardhelp") expandAlias("standardhelpcaster") send("gstatus gstatus/gtell 'cp <target>' for me to cure poison someone.") send("gstatus gstatus/gtell 'cb <target>' for me to cure blindness someone.") send("gstatus gstatus/gtell '" .. string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,3) .. " hiding <on|off>'. (works for hide or camo)") send("gstatus gstatus/gtell '" .. string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,3) .. " deathleech <spell>' to add or remove a spell my list to releech.") send("gstatus gstatus/gtell '" .. string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,3) .. " deathleechlist' for me to list all the spells I releech.") if myVariableTable["TankRescue"] then send("gstatus Automatic tank rescues are ON - gtell '" .. string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,3) .. " rescue [on|off]' to toggle.") send("gstatus " .. gmcp.Char.Score.name .." will rescue tank when they are equal to or below ("..tostring(myVariableTable["RescueTankHp"])..") - gtell '" .. string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,3) .. " rescueat [number]' to configure.") send("gstatus " .. gmcp.Char.Score.name .." will rescue tank when I have more than or equal to ("..tostring(myVariableTable["RescueSelfHp"])..") - gtell '" .. string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,3) .. " rescueself [number]' to configure.") else send("gstatus Automatic tank rescues are OFF - gtell '" .. string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,3) .. " rescue [on|off]' to toggle.") end end

Trigger.name: pfree or pfull
Trigger.script: send("camping") send("cast dowse & drink pudd") expandAlias("sle")

Trigger.name: tank rescues on off
Trigger.script:
if string.lower(matches[5]) == string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[5]),1,3) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,3) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[5]),1,4) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,4) then
myRescueTankHp = getMyConfiguration("rescuetankhp") myRescueSelfHp = getMyConfiguration("rescueselfhp")
matchessix = matches[6]
if string.lower(matchessix) == "on" then if gmcp.Group.leader ~= gmcp.Char.Score.name then setMyConfiguration("TankRescue", 1, 1) send("gstatus "..gmcp.Char.Score.name.." has tank rescues enabled.") send("gstatus I will rescue tank when they are equal to or below ("..tostring(myRescueTankHp)..").") send("gstatus I will rescue tank when I have more than or equal to ("..tostring(myRescueSelfHp)..").") else setMyConfiguration("TankRescue", 0, 1) send("gstatus I cannot rescue myself while leading the group.") end elseif string.lower(matchessix) == "off" then setMyConfiguration("TankRescue", 0, 1) send("gstatus "..gmcp.Char.Score.name.." has tank rescues disabled.") end end

Trigger.name: thorn shield
Trigger.script:
--Create Database if not exists, otherwise update table schema create_tfe_database()
--Load Database to local variable local mydb = db:get_database("skills")
local results = db:fetch(mydb.deathleech, {db:eq(mydb.deathleech.spell, "thorn shield"), db:eq(mydb.deathleech.character, gmcp.Char.Score.name)})[1]
results.leeched = "yes" db:update(mydb.deathleech, results) echo("\nthorn shield releeched")

Trigger.name: barkskin
Trigger.script:
--Create Database if not exists, otherwise update table schema create_tfe_database()
--Load Database to local variable local mydb = db:get_database("skills")
local results = db:fetch(mydb.deathleech, {db:eq(mydb.deathleech.spell, "barkskin"), db:eq(mydb.deathleech.character, gmcp.Char.Score.name)})[1]
results.leeched = "yes" db:update(mydb.deathleech, results) echo("\nbarkskin releeched")

Trigger.name: death
Trigger.script:
onDeath()
--BEGIN Set all leeched spells to not leeched --Create Database if not exists, otherwise update table schema create_tfe_database()
--Load Database to local variable local mydb = db:get_database("skills")
local results = db:fetch(mydb.deathleech, {db:eq(mydb.deathleech.character, gmcp.Char.Score.name)})
--Set leeched to "no" for all spells that I leech db:set(mydb.deathleech.leeched, "no", db:eq(mydb.deathleech.character, gmcp.Char.Score.name))
--END Set all leeched spells to not leeched
tempTimer(10, [[ send ("gstatus Attempting to stand.") send ("cstatus Attempting to stand.") send ("stand") ]])
tempTimer(15, [[ send ("gstatus Attempting to go north one to death.") send ("cstatus Attempting to go north one to death.") send ("north & east") ]])
tempTimer(20, [[ send ("gstatus Attempting to have death take me to Medienne.") send ("cstatus Attempting to have death take me to Medienne.") send ("to death med") ]])
tempTimer(25, [[ send ("gstatus Ok I should be in Medienne at the Crossroads.") send ("cstatus Ok I should be in Medienne at the Crossroads.") send ("gstatus Tell me or gtell 'reportpos' to confirm.") ]])
tempTimer(30, [[ send ("gstatus Please give me back all gear and have me wear everything before issuing the 'gtell/gstatus " .. gmcp.Char.Score.name .. " deathleech' command.") send ("cstatus Please give me back all gear and have me wear everything before issuing the 'gtell/gstatus " .. gmcp.Char.Score.name .. " deathleech' command.") ]])

Trigger.name: death leech
Trigger.script:
if string.lower(matches[3]) == string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[3]),1,3) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,3) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[3]),1,4) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,4) then
send("gstatus Attempting to releech now.") enableTrigger("DeathLeechSpells")
--Create Database if not exists, otherwise update table schema create_tfe_database()
--Load Database to local variable local mydb = db:get_database("skills")
local mysql = "select * from deathleech where character = '" .. gmcp.Char.Score.name .. "' and leeched = 'no'" local results = db:fetch_sql(mydb.deathleech, mysql)
if next(results) then for _, row in ipairs(results) do if row.spell == "continual light" then expandAlias("get3 twist.wire") end if row.spell == "revitalize" then expandAlias("get3 troll.flesh") end if row.spell == "holy wrath" then expandAlias("get3 vial.oil.sac") end
send("cast " .. row.spell) end else send("gstatus All spells are releeched already.") disableTrigger("DeathLeechSpells") end end

Trigger.name: death leech - edit leeched spells
Trigger.script:
if string.lower(matches[3]) == string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[3]),1,3) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,3) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[3]),1,4) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,4) then
deathleechedit(matches[5]) end

Trigger.name: death leech list
Trigger.script:
if string.lower(matches[3]) == string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[3]),1,3) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,3) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[3]),1,4) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,4) then
deathleechlist() end

Trigger.name: death leech clear
Trigger.script:
if string.lower(matches[3]) == string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[3]),1,3) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,3) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[3]),1,4) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,4) then
deathleechclear()
end

Trigger.name: fireflies recast
Trigger.script: fireflies = true set_ability_status("fireflies","yes")

regexCodeList.string: You strengthen your bond with your fireflies.

Trigger.name: fireflies faded
Trigger.script: fireflies = false set_ability_status("fireflies","no")

Trigger.name: life-sight recast
Trigger.script: lifesight = true set_ability_status("life-sight","yes")

regexCodeList.string: Your vision is enhanced to sense warmth.

Trigger.name: life-sight faded
Trigger.script: lifesight = false set_ability_status("life-sight","no")

regexCodeList.string: Your eyes can no longer sense warmth.

Trigger.name: hardiness recast
Trigger.script: hardiness = true set_ability_status("hardiness","yes")

regexCodeList.string: You must wait until hardiness wears off before recasting it.

Trigger.name: hardiness faded
Trigger.script: hardiness = false set_ability_status("hardiness","no")

Trigger.name: arcane-sight recast
Trigger.script: arcanesight = true set_ability_status("arcane-sight","yes")

Trigger.name: arcane-sight faded
Trigger.script: arcanesight = false set_ability_status("arcane-sight","no")

regexCodeList.string: You no longer see the working of magic.

Trigger.name: shadow-sight recast
Trigger.script: shadowsight = true set_ability_status("shadow-sight","yes")

regexCodeList.string: Your awareness of your surroundings has improved.
You must wait until shadow-sight wears off before recasting it.

Trigger.name: shadow-sight faded
Trigger.script: send("gstatus [Alert] shadow-sight has faded.") shadowsight = false set_ability_status("shadow-sight","no")

regexCodeList.string: You feel less aware of your surroundings.

Trigger.name: thornshield recast
Trigger.script: thornshield = true set_ability_status("thorn shield","yes")

regexCodeList.string: A shield of thorns forms around you!
You are protected by a shield of thorns.

Trigger.name: thornshield faded
Trigger.script: thornshield = false set_ability_status("thorn shield","no")

regexCodeList.string: You are no longer protected by a shield of thorns.

Trigger.name: ball of ice
Trigger.script: send("get ball.ice") send("put ball.ice temp")

regexCodeList.string: A ball of ice lies on the ground, tightly packed from ice crystals.

Trigger.name: pile of ice crystals
Trigger.script: send("get ice.cry") send("put ice.cry temp")

regexCodeList.string: A pile of ice crystals lies here, shimmering slightly.

Trigger.name: snail shell
Trigger.script: send("get snail.shell") send("put snail.shell temp")

regexCodeList.string: A snail shell lies on the ground here.

Trigger.name: grain of sand
Trigger.script: send("get grain.sand") send("put grain.sand temp")

regexCodeList.string: A grain of sand lies almost invisible on the ground.

Trigger.name: spider's web
Trigger.script: send("get spider.web") send("put spider.web temp")

regexCodeList.string: A small piece of spider's web lies here.

Trigger.name: pebble
Trigger.script: send("get pebble") send("put pebble temp")

regexCodeList.string: A nice-looking pebble attracts your attention here.

Trigger.name: aloe
Trigger.script: send("pick aloe") send("put aloe temp")

regexCodeList.string: An aloe plant grows here, its spiny leaves sticking out everywhere.
With a certain deftness, you snap an aloe leaf cleanly from the plant.

Trigger.name: herbs
Trigger.script: send("get herbs") send("put herbs temp")

regexCodeList.string: A clump of herbs grows sweet and fragrant.

Trigger.name: glass bead
Trigger.script: send("get glass.bead") send("put glass.bead temp")

regexCodeList.string: A glass bead lies on the ground here, forgotten.

Trigger.name: seashell
Trigger.script: send("get seashell & put seashell temp")

regexCodeList.string: A seashell is covered with sand.

Trigger.name: wintergreen
Trigger.script: send("pick wintergreen & put wintergreen temp")

regexCodeList.string: A wintergreen bush sends a fresh, clean aroma into the air.
You pick a bit from the bush.

Trigger.name: sage
Trigger.script: send("get sage & put sage temp")

regexCodeList.string: A handful of sage, cedar, and cinnamon lies here in a small clump.

Trigger.name: splinter of ebony
Trigger.script: send("get splinter.ebony") send("put splinter.ebony temp")

regexCodeList.string: A splinter of ebony sits on the ground.

Trigger.name: shard of bone
Trigger.script: send("get shard.bone") send("put shard.bone temp")

regexCodeList.string: A shard of bone is lying here.

Trigger.name: shard of glass
Trigger.script: send("get shard.glass") send("put shard.glass temp")

regexCodeList.string: A shard of glass lies glistening on the ground.

Trigger.name: obsidian
Trigger.script: send("get shard & put shard temp")

regexCodeList.string: A shard of obsidian lies glistening on the ground.
A handful of obsidian shards lies in disarray.

Trigger.name: dark gravel
Trigger.script: send("get gravel") send("put gravel temp")

regexCodeList.string: A pile of dark gravel lies here.

Trigger.name: beetle shell
Trigger.script: send("get beetle") send("put beetle temp")

regexCodeList.string: A dried-out beetle shell lies here.

Trigger.name: Join Group
Trigger.script:
Tank = gmcp.Group.leader myChar = gmcp.Char.Score.name send("opt autoloot 2") send("cstatus " .. gmcp.Char.Score.name .. " has joined " .. Tank .. "'s group.") send("gstatus gtell/gstatus '" .. gmcp.Char.Score.name .. " help' to see my commands.") send("gstatus " .. gmcp.Char.Score.name .. " hiding on")
disableTrigger("RangerBots") disableTrigger("RangerSpamSpells") disableTrigger("AllBots") disableTrigger("StableBots") disableTrigger("SpamMapForRepop") setMyConfiguration("hpmonitor", "0", "1") disableTimer("scanner")

Trigger.name: Disband
Trigger.script: Tank = gmcp.Char.Score.name myChar = gmcp.Char.Score.name send("group all") send("say " .. gmcp.Char.Score.name .. " hiding off") send("opt autoloot 2") disableTrigger("RangerBots") disableTrigger("RangerSpamSpells") disableTrigger("AllBots") disableTrigger("StableBots") disableTrigger("SpamMapForRepop") disableTimer("scanner")

regexCodeList.string: ^You try to disband yourself, but fail miserably.$

Trigger.name: Stop Following
Trigger.script: send("cstatus " .. gmcp.Char.Score.name .. " has left " .. Tank .. "'s group.") send("group all") Tank = gmcp.Char.Score.name myChar = gmcp.Char.Score.name send("say " .. gmcp.Char.Score.name .. " hiding off")

Trigger.name: Missing black and white night-heron's feather
Trigger.script:
send("gstatus Missing a black and white night-heron's feather to cast shadow-sight. - Attempting to load one now.")
expandAlias("get3 black.white.feather")

regexCodeList.string: You need a black and white night-heron's feather to cast shadow-sight.

expandAlias("get3 aster.flower")

send("gstatus Missing a lump of coal to cast resist cold. - Attempting to load one now.")
expandAlias("get3 lump.coal")

Trigger.script:
send("gstatus Missing a giant slug skin to cast resist acid. - Attempting to load one now.")
expandAlias("get3 giant.slug.skin")

send("gstatus Missing a seashell to cast water breathing. - Attempting to load one now.")
expandAlias("get3 seashell")

regexCodeList.string: You need a seashell to cast water breathing.

Trigger.name: fireflies
Trigger.script: if Tank == myChar then send("cast fireflies") end

Trigger.name: life-sight
Trigger.script: if Tank == myChar then send("cast life-sight") end

regexCodeList.string: Your eyes can no longer sense warmth.

Trigger.name: hardiness
Trigger.script: if Tank == myChar then send("cast hardiness") end

Trigger.name: cure poison
Trigger.script: if Tank == myChar then tempTimer( 120, [[ send("rem owl & wear rose & cast cure poison & rem rose & wear owl") ]] ) end

Trigger.name: bond companion fade
Trigger.script: if Tank == myChar then tempTimer( 120, [[ send("pets abandon 1") send("cast bond companion") ]] ) end

Trigger.name: calm
Trigger.script: if Tank == myChar then tempTimer( 120, [[ send("cast calm fox") ]] ) end

Trigger.name: forage
Trigger.script: if Tank == myChar then tempTimer( 120, [[ send("forage") ]] ) end

Trigger.name: dowse
Trigger.script: --echo(myChar .. "\n") --echo(Tank .. "\n") if Tank == myChar then send("drink pud.clear.liquid") tempTimer( 120, [[ send("cast dowse") ]] ) end

Trigger.name: ferocity
Trigger.script: send("cast ferocity snow")

regexCodeList.string: A snow-white leopard appears less ferocious.

Trigger.name: viciousness
Trigger.script: send("cast vicious snow")

regexCodeList.string: A snow-white leopard appears less vicious.

Trigger.name: tame
Trigger.script: if Tank == myChar then tempTimer( 120, [[ send("order all rest") send("pets abandon 1") send("cast tame snake") ]] ) end

regexCodeList.string: You need 60 energy points to cast tame.

Trigger.name: tame 10
Trigger.script: disableTrigger("tame")

Trigger.name: rescue trigs2
Trigger.script: if gmcp.Group.leader == gmcp.Char.Score.name and table.contains(CharsInGroup, matches[2]) then send("rescue " .. matches[2] .. " & stand & rescue " .. matches[2]) end

regexCodeList.string: Almost as if expecting (\w+)\'s attack\, a minotaur bailiff quickly lashes
The lammasu swoops back\, then dives forward at (\w+) attacking with tremendous speed\.

Trigger.name: rescue worked
Trigger.script: send("gstatus " .. matches[2] .. " has been rescued by " .. gmcp.Char.Score.name .. ".")

Trigger.name: rescue trigs4
Trigger.script: if gmcp.Group.leader == gmcp.Char.Score.name and table.contains(CharsInGroup, matches[4]) then send("rescue " .. matches[4] .. " & stand & rescue " .. matches[4]) end

regexCodeList.string: A lammasu's claw of justice (\w+) \[(\d+)\] (\w+)'s arm\! \[ (.*) \]

Trigger.name: rescue trigs3
Trigger.script: if gmcp.Group.leader == gmcp.Char.Score.name and table.contains(CharsInGroup, matches[3]) then send("rescue " .. matches[3] .. " & stand & rescue " .. matches[3]) end

regexCodeList.string: stops attacking (\w+) and leaps to attack (\w+)\.

Trigger.name: Thorn Shield
Trigger.script:
--If you want to be using the matches table after calling expandAlias, --you should save it first as local oldmatches = matches before calling --expandAlias, since expandAlias will overwrite it after using it again. local oldmatches = matches[2]
send("stand") expandAlias("get3 thorn") send ("cast thorn shield " .. oldmatches) expandAlias("put3 thorn")

Trigger.name: Water Breathing
Trigger.script:
--If you want to be using the matches table after calling expandAlias, --you should save it first as local oldmatches = matches before calling --expandAlias, since expandAlias will overwrite it after using it again. local oldmatches = matches[2]
send("stand") expandAlias("get3 seashell") send ("cast water breathing " .. oldmatches) expandAlias("put3 seashell")

Trigger.name: Dowse
Trigger.script:
--If you want to be using the matches table after calling expandAlias, --you should save it first as local oldmatches = matches before calling --expandAlias, since expandAlias will overwrite it after using it again. local oldmatches = matches[2]
send("stand") expandAlias("get3 dowsing.stick") send ("cast dowse")

Trigger.name: List of Commands
Trigger.script: send ("group") send ("tell " .. matches[2] .. " Make sure we are both intro'd to each other.") send ("tell " .. matches[2] .. " Make sure we are both in the same room.") send ("tell " .. matches[2] .. " Tell me 'thornme' for me to leech thorn shield.") send ("tell " .. matches[2] .. " Tell me 'dowseme' for me to dowse for a drink.") send ("tell " .. matches[2] .. " Tell me 'waterme' for me to leech water breathing.") send ("tell " .. matches[2] .. " Tell me 'cpme' for cast cure poison on you.") send ("tell " .. matches[2] .. " Tell me 'cbme' for cast cure blindness on you.") send ("tell " .. matches[2] .. " Tell me 'healme' for cast balm on you.") send ("tell " .. matches[2] .. " Tell me 'racidme' for me to leech resist acid on you.") send ("tell " .. matches[2] .. " Tell me 'rfireme' for me to leech resist fire on you.") send ("tell " .. matches[2] .. " Tell me 'rcoldme' for me to leech resist cold on you.") send ("tell " .. matches[2] .. " Tell me 'rshockme' for me to leech resist shock on you.")

Trigger.name: Cure Poison
Trigger.script:
--If you want to be using the matches table after calling expandAlias, --you should save it first as local oldmatches = matches before calling --expandAlias, since expandAlias will overwrite it after using it again. local oldmatches = matches[2]
send("stand") send ("cast cure poison " .. oldmatches)

Trigger.name: Cure Blind
Trigger.script:
--If you want to be using the matches table after calling expandAlias, --you should save it first as local oldmatches = matches before calling --expandAlias, since expandAlias will overwrite it after using it again. local oldmatches = matches[2]
send("stand") send ("cast cure blindess " .. oldmatches)

Trigger.name: Resist Acid
Trigger.script:
--If you want to be using the matches table after calling expandAlias, --you should save it first as local oldmatches = matches before calling --expandAlias, since expandAlias will overwrite it after using it again. local oldmatches = matches[2]
send("stand") expandAlias("get3 giant.slug.skin") send ("cast resist acid " .. oldmatches)

Trigger.name: Resist Fire
Trigger.script:
--If you want to be using the matches table after calling expandAlias, --you should save it first as local oldmatches = matches before calling --expandAlias, since expandAlias will overwrite it after using it again. local oldmatches = matches[2]
send("stand") expandAlias("get3 ice-blue.diamond") send ("cast resist fire " .. oldmatches)

Trigger.name: Resist Shock
Trigger.script:
--If you want to be using the matches table after calling expandAlias, --you should save it first as local oldmatches = matches before calling --expandAlias, since expandAlias will overwrite it after using it again. local oldmatches = matches[2]
send("stand") expandAlias("get3 graphite.rod") send ("cast resist shock " .. oldmatches)

Trigger.name: Resist Cold
Trigger.script:
--If you want to be using the matches table after calling expandAlias, --you should save it first as local oldmatches = matches before calling --expandAlias, since expandAlias will overwrite it after using it again. local oldmatches = matches[2]
send("stand") expandAlias("get3 lump.coal") send ("cast resist cold " .. oldmatches)

Trigger.name: Balm
Trigger.script:
--If you want to be using the matches table after calling expandAlias, --you should save it first as local oldmatches = matches before calling --expandAlias, since expandAlias will overwrite it after using it again. local oldmatches = matches[2]
send("stand") expandAlias("get3 clump.herbs") send ("cast balm " .. oldmatches)

Trigger.name: krasnog
Trigger.script: send("quaf swirl") send("cast wither mage") disableTrigger("krasnog")

Trigger.name: Leader blind unhide
Trigger.script: if matches[2] == gmcp.Group.leader then if table.contains(gmcp.Char.Status.flags,"hiding") then send("unhide") end end
